thread.title: 2017 World Baseball Classic Canada vs. USA: Score, results, highlights, live blog
thread.title_full: 2017 World Baseball Classic Canada vs. USA: Score, results, highlights, live blog

author: Dayn Perry
title: 2017 World Baseball Classic Canada vs. USA: Score, results, highlights, live blog
text:
5m ago • 1 min read 
The United States and Canada play a must-win World Baseball Classic contest on Sunday night. As noted previously in this space, if the U.S. wins they advance and join the Dominican Republic in the next round. If Canada wins, then things get complicated based on the score. 
Either way, we’ll be here to update any tiebreaker scenarios as they come into play. We’ll also be here live-blog all the action from Miami -- highlights, observations, updated score, all that good stuff. So hang out with us as the U.S. tries to extend its WBC life for 2017 ...
